summary.introduction: QA Engineer with 3 years of experience building quality from the ground up in fast-paced product teams.
body: Known for thinking beyond the checklist, uncovering hidden edge cases, refining requirements with product owners, and embedding quality at every stage of the development cycle.
Collaborates closely with developers to detect early issues and ensure seamless, high-quality releases.
Brings a sharp eye for detail and a strong sense of ownership to every launch.

skills.name: Tools: Jira, AIO Test Management, Tuskr, Firebase, Docker, AWS, Retool, PostHog, Google Analytics, Elastic, Odoo, HubSpot

experience.title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer
description: Performed end-to-end manual testing for web, Android, and iOS apps, covering complex modules such as multi-tenancy, live updates, report cards, lesson plans, and teacher observations.
Automated key modules like Exam Generator and Class Management using Cypress.
Conducted API testing, SQL validation, and event tracking using PostHog and Firebase.
Developed a Python-based CSV cleanup tool integrated with Django Admin to automate data correction.
Led QA for major releases, including the Balochistan project launch and AWS-to-QCloud migration.
Collaborated with developers on PR testing, refined SRDs with product managers, and participated in Agile ceremonies.
Conducted usability testing with teachers and supported large-scale field validations.
Mentored junior QA engineers and assisted in QA hiring.

experience.title: Quality Assurance Intern
description: Used the in-house automation tool ITAS to create and execute test cases.
Performed exploratory testing on live websites to uncover defects.
Contributed to the creation of reusable and effective test cases.
Collaborated with engineers on QA-related initiatives.

projects.title: Python-based CSV Data Cleanup Tool
projects.description: Developed and integrated a Python tool into Django Admin to clean and correct student data across thousands of records.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Science
education.details: Completed coursework in software development, testing, and systems design.
